mean_cn: n. 【总称】陶器；  adj. 陶制的
mean_en: a heavy substance that is made by baking clay and that is usually covered with another substance (called a glaze) before it is baked so that it will not absorb water
word_etyma: earth土地+en含...的 + ware物体 →earthen泥土的+ ware物体  → 土器, 陶器
sentence: There were a lot of ancient earthenware in the museum.
sentence_trans: 博物馆里存放了大量的古陶器。
